entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to rain showers at times heavy this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 late this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 5:07 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
